website_summaries.verdict: This model is better insulated than some others and keeps your food cool longer.
pros: Has a deep front pocket for dry items
Can keep ice frozen for several hours
Does a good job of holding water without leaks
Padded straps make it comfortable to carry
Works well for a family of 4 on a daytime outing
cons: This backpack can get pretty heavy when full

customer_reviews.title: This was the 3rd Igloo Marine backpack cooler we purchased
customer_reviews.text: We have always loved our Igloo marine backpack coolers and recommended to others throughout the years. The reason we had to replace the others was one flew out of the boat and the other one, the zipper broke after years of use. However we are extremely disappointed that this backpack started leaking after a month or so. We have owned others identical to this one and they never leaked. For the price it should last MUCH longer than a month. I guess Igloo's quality is no longer a priority.
customer_reviews.author: Phillips Family

customer_reviews.title: It’s a piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product! Fell apart in one use. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Unraveling seams
customer_reviews.text: Seams are already unraveling before we even got to use it.
customer_reviews.author: lala moose

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for a poor cooler
customer_reviews.text: Our old cooler was cheap and we got tired of it. The backpack looked like a good replacement and it has performed even better than we hoped. It holds a lot, is easier to carry than the old cooler, and seems to keep things pretty cold. We have not given it a hard test -- neither hot conditions nor a long duration event -- but everything I've seen so far says it will be far better than our old cooler was.
customer_reviews.author: Pinball Lizard

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s spacious like I wanted but the zipper broke on the first use. The zipper is not stuck...the actual zipper piece separated from the metal piece that closes the zipper teeth.
customer_reviews.author: carol gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than I Thought - Looks Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I must admit that my first impression was that this cooler was smaller than I expected. But once I loaded her up and strapped her on, she looked great. Kinda like a '80's bowling bag! I used this cooler on several fishing boats trips and my drinks stayed cool all day long in the sun. The cooler is sealed very well so the seats in my new truck stayed dry! The dry compartment on top was perfect for cell phones and gopro cameras.
customer_reviews.author: The Honest Critique

customer_reviews.title: Space for days!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler backpack is perfect and is big enough to fit my five meals per day in, several ice blocks and condiments. And that’s just the cooler. There’s even more space in the side cubbies, the top pocket and the huge outside pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Sheaden O David

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT KEEP CONTENTS COLD-EVEN w/MULTIPLE COLD PACKS
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and seemingly sturdy product. Time will tell. Does not keep contents cold at all. Cold packs are melted w/in 3-4 hours. The previous Igloo I had worked marginally better yet it tore at the shoulder strap after about a month or two of daily use. Very disappointed as it is an IGLOO product. Makes me wonder where they are made now,..
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cooler. I just use it to pack lunch or a couple on the road meals. Loads of room. Works great. Stays real cold. Seems real sturdy. Have not carried it very far, just from the car to office. And it looks good great!
customer_reviews.author: dbpt78

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler back pack. Kept everything a perfect temperature with only two. Cheap ice packs And it has an amazing amount of room. The backpack will compete with any of the high-end ones I feel it's better. Due to its much cheaper. Only issue is when you get about 40 lb 50 lb of stuff in there It's a little uncomfortable. But that's with any backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Butler

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: We really like this cooler can’t get over how it keeps ice and drinks cold.
customer_reviews.author: Smb

customer_reviews.title: Large and nice to carry
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to put plenty of food. Keep things cool so far. But it isn’t summer yet so not sure how well it works in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: hanovaman

customer_reviews.title: it was perfect..
customer_reviews.text: it was the perfect size, lightweight, easy to clean. i packed it with clothes n cell phone chargers AND used it as a carry-on , on my flight to Hawaii ... once in Hawaii, i used it as the perfect cooler to take to the beach, and on hiking trails,,, best thing i have bought..
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were more durable
customer_reviews.text: To be honest with you I think they are great perfect only problem I have is this the second one I bought another strap is broken on this one also I have really used it makes no sense but I’m going to buy another one because I do like them but not sure what I’m gonna do about the straps like I got a baby them
customer_reviews.author: John Alferd Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everything cold
customer_reviews.text: Large capacity and it keeps items in the cooler very cold. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable cooler
customer_reviews.text: This cooler not only keeps everything cool for hours but is also very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Walters

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Straps broke after 9 months. Horrible purchase do not buy. I am staying away from igloo from now on. Awesome idea love the concept but this quality is poor.
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: First use and it started leaking at the bottom. Maybe it was condensation, but it was a LOT. For the price of some of the other backpack coolers, you might as well break the bank and buy a nicer quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Donna W Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far happy with my purchase. Only used it once but did the job and lived the backpack style straps
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling to the beach
customer_reviews.text: Great combination cooler/backpack. I used it to travel in the plane and then used it in the beach to keep our favorite beverages cold. After all day in the hot sun, the ice barely melted!
customer_reviews.author: vwc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Holds a complete thirty pack and keeps the beer ice cold for hours! Have recommended to everybody who has asked.
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: Exchange
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this backpack for a few weeks now the shoulder strap has already ripped off and the hoop has also ripped off down to one handle they need to make this better
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I needed it to do at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome for beach trips or hikes. It does have a condensation issue but that was to be expected with the soft shell. All in all it is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: This is Junk! Leaks very bad!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought for the amount of money I was getting a quality cooler. The very first day I fill it with drinks and ice and it leaks all in my car. This is junk!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hansen

customer_reviews.title: It keeps my food cold all day.
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best lunch bag ever. I work in the plant industry and it keep my food chilled all day.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette Pete

customer_reviews.title: Zipper’s are fragile and weak
customer_reviews.text: Zipper break off easily or it would of gotten a way better review.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Marto

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible ~ had it 31/2 months and the strap is broken already
customer_reviews.author: dr

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for drinks and lunch and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Santos

customer_reviews.title: 32 cans is a stretch.
customer_reviews.text: 32 cans with ZERO ice. Can only get about 20 with ice.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pelham

customer_reviews.title: It had blood on it
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and it looks like theres dry blood
customer_reviews.author: Robert Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Well built with great features
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a cushioned carrier for my chart plotter, gloves, sunglasses, Bluetooth headset, sunscreen and other fishing necessities. I can strap it to my poling platform as additional storage on my skiff. The insulation keeps my phone from getting too hot in the sun. Haven’t even tried it as a cooler.
customer_reviews.author: D. Paxton

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel baseball
customer_reviews.text: Great option for travel baseball families. Put a bat in the side or both and you will get in all the time with your own drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Nickflyz

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: do not buy this product. I have been waiting over a month on a 5 day delivery. This is just sad.
customer_reviews.author: jacob dressel

product_meta.title: Igloo Marine Backpack
product_meta.description:
Keep your hands free and the weather out with this insulated backpack cooler. Plenty of room for your daily needs, this backpack is a great everyday choice

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Igloo
feature_bullets: Made of 600-denier polyester with a TPE Coating to help ensure lasting use
MaxCold insulation with 25% more foam to keep food and drinks cooler longer
Deep, insulated front pocket provide additional storage
Adjustable, padded air mesh comfort straps for hands-free carrying convenience with sternum straps to distribute the load
Side mesh pocket with elastic strap buckle to keep beverage bottles from falling out

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
